osvSchema.details: Memory corruption in Modem while processing security related configuration before AS Security Exchange.

description_data.value: Memory corruption in Modem while processing security related configuration before AS Security Exchange.

description.value: CWE-823 Use of Out-of-range Pointer Offset

descriptions.value: Memory corruption in Modem while processing security related configuration before AS Security Exchange.
Corrupción de la memoria en el Modem mientras se procesa la configuración relacionada con la seguridad antes de AS Security Exchange.
